name: Speedo Endurance Square Leg Swimsuit - Men's
description: Made from Speedo's longest lasting fabric, this suit is highly resistant to chlorine and resists fading in the sun. Designed for swimmers who are training and prepping to compete.Endurance+ fabric is chlorine-resistant and retaind colour and shape.Body-hugging fit reduces drag.No-slip drawcord at waist.Lined front panel.
